items.sentence: I could have stayed a while longer, but I was getting tired, so I decided to leave.
I spend as much time working in the garden in one day as my brother does in a week.
The president\'s sudden resignation has rattled the company. What should we do now?
I know I should sleep for at least eight hours a day, however I usually sleep less.
I think Tom understands that if he wants my help, all he needs to do is ask for it.
